name: GAM3R GLOV3S - It's GG!
blurb: Providing the most unique, comfortable, and quality design structure in a glove that will enhance physical and mental performance.

rewards.reward: No Reward

THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT:
Receive a personal thank you E-Card via email. 
Additionally, receive a special thank you on our website with a page dedicated directly to our Kickstarter backers, along with a social media blast on Gamer Gloves Twitter and Facebook pages (will need to provide twitter name).
Lastly, receive monthly updates on the latest GG product details by email!
GG POSTER:\r\nReceive a specialized GG Poster and show off your BELIEF! (poster options located at the bottom of page) FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA!
GG LEVEL 1 "Start-It" PAIR:\r\nReceive GAM3R GLOV3S Level 1 "Start-It" edition! Retail Price: $19.99. (color/size options can be found at the bottom of the page) FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA!

PERFORMANCE BRACELET: Receive a GG Performance Bracelet incorporated with negative ion technology. Negative ions have been proven to  rejuvenate all of the body's systems and cells, therefore stimulating a healthier and stronger overall lifestyle. (size options can be found at the bottom of the page) FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA!

PERFORMANCE T-SHIRT:\r\nReceive a GG Performance T-Sirt with much added style and comfort and can be worn in any condition! (color/size options can be found at the bottom of the page) FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA!

SPECIAL: SUPER EARLY BIRD PRE-ORDER! Receive your very own pair of GAM3R GLOV3S Level 2 "Prove-It" edition allowing the size and color variation of your choice! (color/size options can be found at the bottom of the page) FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA!
PACKAGE: T-SHIRT/LEVEL 1! \r\nReceive a GG Performance T-Shirt and a pair of GG Level 1 "Start-It" Gamer Gloves! (color/size options can be found at the bottom of the page) FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA!

PRE-ORDER LEVEL 2:\r\nReceive your very own pair of GAM3R GLOV3S Level 2 "Prove-It" edition allowing the size and color variation of your choice! (color/size options can be found at the bottom of the page) FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA!

PACKAGE SPECIAL: LEVEL 2 / PERFORMANCE BRACELET! Receive your very own pair of GAM3R GLOV3S Level 2 "Prove-It" edition allowing the size and color variation of your choice as well as a GG Performance Bracelet! (color/size options can be found at the bottom of the page) FREE SHIPPING IN USA!

PACKAGE: T-SHIRT / BRACELET / LEVEL 1 / POSTER!\r\nReceive a GG Performance T-Shirt, a pair of GG Level 1 "Start-It" Gamer Gloves, a GG Performance Bracelet, and 1 of 3 GG Posters. (ALL REWARD colors/sizes/options can be found at the bottom of the page) FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA!

PACKAGE SPECIAL: LEVEL 2 / PERFORMANCE BRACELET / PERFORMANCE T-SHIRT! Receive your very own pair of GAM3R GLOV3S Level 2 "Prove-It" edition allowing the size and color variation of your choice, a GG Performance Bracelet, and a GG Performance T-Shirt! (color/size options can be found at the bottom of the page) FREE SHIPPING IN USA!

TEAM PACKAGE: Receive 4 pairs of GAM3R GLOV3S Level 2 "Prove-It" edition allowing the size and color variation of your choice! (color/size/options can be found at the bottom of the page) FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA!

TEAM PACKAGE 2 SPECIAL: LEVEL 2 / ENERGY BRACELET! Receive 4 pairs of GAM3R GLOV3S Level 2 "Prove-It" edition allowing the size and color variation of your choice as well as 4 GG Performance Bracelets! (color/size/options can be found at the bottom of the page) FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA!

TEAM PACKAGE 3 SPECIAL: LEVEL 2 / PERFORMANCE BRACELET / PERFORMANCE T-SHIRT! Receive 4 pairs of GAM3R GLOV3S Level 2 "Prove-It" edition allowing the size and color variation of your choice, 4 GG Performance Bracelets, and 4 GG Performance T-Shirts! (color/size/options can be found at the bottom of the page) FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA!

TEAM PACKAGE 4: LEVEL 2 / PERFORMANCE BRACELETS / PERFORMANCE T-SHIRTS! Receive 4 pairs of GAM3R GLOV3S Level 2 "Prove-It" edition allowing the size and color variation of your choice as well as 4 GG Performance Bracelets, and 4 GG Performance T-Shirts! (color/size/options can be found at the bottom of the page) FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA!
CUSTOM TEAM PACKAGE: LEVEL 2!  \r\nReceive 4 pairs of GAM3R GLOV3S Level 2 "Prove-It" edition allowing the color variation and logo implementation of your choice! FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA!

CUSTOMIZE IT YOURSELF: LEVEL 2! \r\nCreate your own COLOR COMBINATIONS, GRAPHIC DESIGN, and LOGOS of your choice to be implemented on the GG Level 2 "Prove-It" edition! YOU will be the ONLY one in the WORLD with these gloves! Each additional REWARD category with value lower than donation amount included. (Not Included - Packages, Specials) FREE SHIPPING IN THE USA!

INVITATION! \r\nReceive an invite (invite only) to the Special Event Party for the CELEBRATION of launching GG Level 2 "Prove-It" edition! Also receive a HOME PLATE BOX ticket for a Minnesota Twins game during your trip. Each additional REWARD category with value lower than donation amount included.\r\n(Not Included - Packages, Specials, Expenses)

DING! \r\nLodging and Meal expenses covered for a 2 day, 3 night VACATION for 1 person to the BEAUTIFUL Twin Cities of MINNESOTA.  Receive an invite (invite only) to the Special Event Party for the CELEBRATION of launching GG Level 2 "Prove-It" edition! Also receive a HOME PLATE BOX ticket for a Minnesota Twins game during your trip. Each additional REWARD category with value lower than donation amount included. PRIZES will be PERSONALLY hand delivered by the founders of Gamer Gloves upon arrival. \r\n(Not Included - Packages, Specials, $1,000)

DING DING!! \r\nLodging and Meal expenses covered for a 2 day, 3 night VACATION for 1 person to the BEAUTIFUL Twin Cities of MINNESOTA. Discuss the future VISION of Gamer Gloves in a PUBLIC meeting, while on board a YACHT CRUISE enjoying the scenery  Historic Lake Minnetonka has to offer. Receive an invite (invite only) to the Special Event Party for the CELEBRATION of launching GG Level 2 "Prove-It" edition! Also receive a HOME PLATE BOX ticket for a Minnesota Twins game during your trip. Each additional REWARD category with value lower than donation amount included. PRIZES will be PERSONALLY hand delivered by the founders of Gamer Gloves upon arrival.\r\n(Not Included - Packages, Specials, $2,500, $1,000)

DING DING DING!!!\r\nAll expense paid 2 day, 3 night VACATION for 1 person to the BEAUTIFUL Twin Cities of  MINNESOTA. Discuss the future VISION of Gamer Gloves in a PRIVATE meeting, while on board a YACHT CRUISE down the MISSISSIPPI RIVER. Help create/develop a LIMITED EDITION GG that will be named after the backer! Receive an invite (invite only) to the Special Event Party for the CELEBRATION of launching GG Level 2 "Prove-It" edition! Also receive a HOME PLATE BOX ticket for a Minnesota Twins game during your trip. Each additional REWARD category with value lower than donation amount included. PRIZES will be PERSONALLY hand delivered by the founders of Gamer Gloves upon arrival.\r\n(Not Included - Packages, Specials, $5,000, $2,500, $1,000)
